title: Create Dependabot configuration
body:
**What is the purpose of this pull request? (put an "X" next to item)**

[ ] Documentation update
[ ] Bug fix
[ ] New feature
[x] Other, please explain: Configure Dependabot so that you have a working dependency bot.

**What changes did you make? (Give an overview)**

- Create a Dependabot config.

**Which issue (if any) does this pull request address?**

Closes #1550

**Is there anything you'd like reviewers to focus on?**

**References:**

[Official GitHub Dependabot configuration options documentation](https://docs.github.com/en/free-pro-team@latest/github/administering-a-repository/configuration-options-for-dependency-updates)

**Things you probably should do after merging:**

- [ ] Delete Greenkeeper app, see the [GitHub Docs on deleting a GitHub app](https://docs.github.com/en/free-pro-team@latest/developers/apps/deleting-a-github-app).
- [x] Remove stale Greenkeeper branches on this repository, see this [list of stale branches for standard/standard repository](https://github.com/standard/standard/branches/stale).
